response.original_title: Mefa Jai Jau Fanai Mera Tofong
response.overview: Benny Corputty is an athletic trainer. He is accompanied by many achievements that make the area where he trains, Yapen Island, Papua proud. For Benny Corputty, coaching athletics is a calling in life. Therefore, he continues to train, although there is no support and attention from the government. During Benny's training, he never sees money as his goal. His sincere way of training makes many athletes want to fight until they excel.The abandoned Marora Stadium, becomes a silent witness where Benny Corputty devotes his energy, time, and thoughts to bring home achievements for his region without being reciprocated.
response.title: Mefa Jai Jau Fanai Mera Tofong
